headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CLAYTON, HELEN ELIZABETH TRACIE (BETTY)

snippet: CLAYTON--Helen Elizabeth Tracie (Betty). Two months short of her 94th birthday. Predeceased in 2008 by Robert, her husband of 54 years. Mother of William C. and Tracie E. and esteemed mother-in-law of Peter Hom. 1/3
lead_paragraph: CLAYTON--Helen Elizabeth Tracie (Betty). Two months short of her 94th birthday. Predeceased in 2008 by Robert, her husband of 54 years. Mother of William C. and Tracie E. and esteemed mother-in-law of Peter Hom. 1/3
